blocks.name: isfne
blocks.content: The predicate " ` B ` is finer than ` A ` ". This property is, in a sense, the opposite of refinement, as refinement requires every element to be a subset of an element of the original and fineness requires that every element of the original have a subset in the finer cover containing every point. I do not know of a literature reference for this. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfne(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  pm5.21nd(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  ancoms(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  anim1i(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex1i(c2, cfne, c0)
  fnerel()
  adantrr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)))
  syldan(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  3eqtr3g(cuni(c2), cuni(c0), c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4))
  jca(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c2), universe))
  eqeltrd(cuni(c2), universe, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0))))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)))
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, c1, cfne, wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))), wa(wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))))))), wa(wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, cv(hs0), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0)))))), wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  eqeq1d(cuni(cv(hs0)), cuni(cv(hs1)), c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs0)), c3, cuni(c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  unieq(cv(hs0), c2)
  raleq(s0, cv(hs0), c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))))))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wceq(c3, cuni(cv(hs1))), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0)))))), wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))))))
  eqeq2d(c3, cuni(cv(hs1)), c4, wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  syl6eqr(cuni(cv(hs1)), c4, cuni(c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  unieq(cv(hs1), c0)
  ralbidv(s0, c2, wceq(cv(hs1), c0), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))))), wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))
  sseq2d(cv(s0), cuni(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0)))), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  unieqd(cin(cv(hs1), cpw(cv(s0))), cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))), wceq(cv(hs1), c0))
  ineq1(cv(hs1), c0, cpw(cv(s0)))
  df-fne(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wss(cv(s0), cuni(cin(c0, cpw(cv(s0))))))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

thm isfne(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[Fne]c0 ↔(c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))))))
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c2
  ⊣ c4 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[Fne]c0 ↔(c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))))), d(s0, c1))
  pm5.21nd(c0 ∈ c1, c2[Fne]c0, (c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))), (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  ancoms(c0 ∈ c1, c2[Fne]c0, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  anim1i(c2[Fne]c0, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex1i(c2, cfne, c0)
  fnerel()
  adantrr(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))), (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1))
  syldan(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c0 ∈ c1), ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0)
  3eqtr3g(⋃ c2, ⋃ c0, c3, c4, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 = c4))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4)
  jca((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0), c2 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrd(⋃ c2, universe, ⋃ c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, ⋃ c2 = ⋃ c0)
  brabg(hs0, hs1, c2, universe, c0, c1, cfne, (c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))), (⋃ hs0 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0)))), (c3 = ⋃ hs1 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0)))))
  anbi12d(hs0 = c2, ⋃ hs0 = ⋃ hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ hs0, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0))), c3 = ⋃ hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0))))
  eqeq1d(⋃ hs0, ⋃ hs1, c3, hs0 = c2)
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs0, c3, ⋃ c2, hs0 = c2)
  unieq(hs0, c2)
  raleq(s0, hs0, c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0)))
  anbi12d(hs1 = c0, c3 = ⋃ hs1, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0))), c3 = c4, ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0))))
  eqeq2d(c3, ⋃ hs1, c4, hs1 = c0)
  syl6eqr(⋃ hs1, c4, ⋃ c0, hs1 = c0)
  unieq(hs1, c0)
  ralbidv(s0, c2, hs1 = c0, s0 ⊆ ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0)), s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))
  sseq2d(s0, ⋃(hs1 ⋂ P(s0)), ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)), hs1 = c0)
  unieqd((hs1 ⋂ P(s0)), (c0 ⋂ P(s0)), hs1 = c0)
  ineq1(hs1, c0, P(s0))
  df-fne(hs0, hs1, s0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))))
  diff.hs1.w((c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ⊆ ⋃(c0 ⋂ P(s0)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs1, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: isfne4
blocks.content: The predicate " ` B ` is finer than ` A ` " in terms of the topology generation function. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfne4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
  -| wceq(c2, cuni(c0))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c1))
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))), wcel(c1, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cfne, c1)
  fnerel()
  sylibr(wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cuni(c1), universe))
  eqeltrrd(cuni(c1), universe, cuni(c0), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
  3eqtr3g(cuni(c0), cuni(c1), c2, c3, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))))
  simpl(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  sylib(wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))), wcel(cuni(c0), universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  adantl(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  ssex(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))
  fvex(ctg, c1)
  uniexb(c0)
  uniexb(c1)
  bitr4d(wcel(c1, universe), wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c1, cpw(cv(hs0))))))))
  isfne(hs0, c1, universe, c0, c2, c3)
  anbi2d(wcel(c1, universe), wceq(c2, c3), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c1, cpw(cv(hs0)))))))
  syl5bb(wcel(c1, universe), wss(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)), wral(hs0, c0, wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c1, cpw(cv(hs0)))))), wral(hs0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c1))))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, cfv(ctg, c1))
  ralbidv(hs0, c0, wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wss(cv(hs0), cuni(cin(c1, cpw(cv(hs0))))))
  eltg(c1, universe, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c1, universe))
}

thm isfne4(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fne]c1 ↔(c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)))
  ⊣ c2 = ⋃ c0
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c1
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0[Fne]c1, (c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  brrelex2i(c0, cfne, c1)
  fnerel()
  sylibr((c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)), c1 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrrd(⋃ c1, universe, ⋃ c0, (c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)))
  3eqtr3g(⋃ c0, ⋃ c1, c2, c3, (c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)))
  simpl(c2 = c3, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1))
  sylib((c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)), ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(c2 = c3, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ssex(c0, (topGen ` c1))
  fvex(ctg, c1)
  uniexb(c0)
  uniexb(c1)
  bitr4d(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0[Fne]c1, (c2 = c3 ∧ c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1)), (c2 = c3 ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(hs0)))))
  isfne(hs0, c1, universe, c0, c2, c3)
  anbi2d(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2 = c3, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(hs0))))
  syl5bb(c1 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ⊆(topGen ` c1), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(hs0))), ∀(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈(topGen ` c1)))
  dfss3(hs0, c0, (topGen ` c1))
  ralbidv(hs0, c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, hs0 ∈(topGen ` c1), hs0 ⊆ ⋃(c1 ⋂ P(hs0)))
  eltg(c1, universe, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(universe)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` c1))
  diff.hs0.w(c1 ∈ 𝕌)
}

blocks.name: isfne4b
blocks.content: A condition for a topology to be finer than another. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfne4b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0)))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0))), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wss(c2, cfv(ctg, c0))))
  pm5.32da(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(c2, cfv(ctg, c0)))
  syl2anc(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)), wb(wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0)), wss(c2, cfv(ctg, c0))), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cuni(c2), universe))
  eqeltrd(cuni(c2), universe, cuni(c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  3eqtr3g(cuni(c2), cuni(c0), c3, c4, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4))
  adantr(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4), wcel(cuni(c0), universe))
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  simpl(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c3, c4))
  tgss3(c2, universe, c0, c1)
  isfne4(c2, c0, c3, c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm isfne4b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[Fne]c0 ↔(c3 = c4 ∧(topGen ` c2)⊆(topGen ` c0))))
  ⊣ c3 = ⋃ c2
  ⊣ c4 = ⋃ c0
} = {
  syl6rbbr(c0 ∈ c1, c2[Fne]c0, (c3 = c4 ∧(topGen ` c2)⊆(topGen ` c0)), (c3 = c4 ∧ c2 ⊆(topGen ` c0)))
  pm5.32da(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4, (topGen ` c2)⊆(topGen ` c0), c2 ⊆(topGen ` c0))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 = c4), ((topGen ` c2)⊆(topGen ` c0)↔ c2 ⊆(topGen ` c0)), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 = c4), c2 ∈ 𝕌, ⋃ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqeltrd(⋃ c2, universe, ⋃ c0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 = c4))
  3eqtr3g(⋃ c2, ⋃ c0, c3, c4, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c3 = c4))
  simpr(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4)
  adantr(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4, ⋃ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  uniexg(c0, c1)
  uniexb(c2)
  simpl(c0 ∈ c1, c3 = c4)
  tgss3(c2, universe, c0, c1)
  isfne4(c2, c0, c3, c4)
}

blocks.name: isfne2
blocks.content: The predicate " ` B ` is finer than ` A ` ". (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm isfne2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0)))))))))
  -| wceq(c3, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c4, cuni(c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))), diffsc(s1, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, c1), wbr(c2, cfne, c0), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))), wa(wceq(c3, c4), wss(c2, cfv(ctg, c0))))
  isfne4(c2, c0, c3, c4)

  ralbidv(s0, c2, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cfv(ctg, c0)), wral(s1, cv(s0), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wss(cv(s2), cv(s0))))))

thm isfne2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2[Fne]c0 ↔(c3 = c4 ∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))))))

  syl5bb(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ⊆(topGen ` c0), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, ∀(s1 ∈ s0, ∃(s2 ∈ c0,(s1 ∈ s2 ∧ s2 ⊆ s0)))), ∀(s0 ∈ c2, s0 ∈(topGen ` c0)))
  dfss3(s0, c2, (topGen ` c0))

blocks.name: fnebas
blocks.content: A finer cover covers the same set as the original. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: fnetg
blocks.content: A finer cover generates a topology finer than the original set. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: fnessex
blocks.content: If ` B ` is finer than ` A ` and ` S ` is an element of ` A ` , every point in ` S ` is an element of a subset of ` S ` which is in ` B ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 28-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: fneuni
blocks.content: If ` B ` is finer than ` A ` , every element of ` A ` is a union of elements of ` B ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 11-Oct-2009.)

thm fneuni(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, cv(hs0)))), wss(cint(crab(s0, c1, wcel(c2, cv(s0)))), cv(hs0)), wrex(hs1, c1, wa(wcel(c2, cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)))))

  syl2anc(w3a(wss(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2))), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs2))))
  3adant3(wss(c2, c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs2), c0))
  ssel2(c2, c0, cv(hs2))

  rgen2(hs2, hs0, c0, cv(hs2), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  mpanr2(wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wrex(hs1, c0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))
  ssid(cv(hs2))

  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), wss(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wss(cv(hs2), cv(hs2)))
  elequ2(hs1, hs2, hs0)
  sseq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs2), cv(hs2))
  isfne2(hs2, hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c0, cuni(c0), cuni(c0))

  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs2))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)

blocks.name: fnetr
blocks.content: Transitivity of the fineness relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 5-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)

thm fnetr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wbr(c1, cfne, c2)), wbr(c0, cfne, c2))
} = {
  mpbir2and(wa(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wbr(c1, cfne, c2)), wbr(c0, cfne, c2), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)))

  fnebas(c0, c1, cuni(c0), cuni(c1))
  fnebas(c1, c2, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  sylan9ss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c1), wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wbr(c1, cfne, c2))
  mpancom(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wcel(c1, universe))
  brrelex2i(c0, cfne, c1)

  isfne4b(c1, universe, c0, cuni(c0), cuni(c1))
  mpancom(wbr(c1, cfne, c2), wss(cfv(ctg, c1), cfv(ctg, c2)), wcel(c2, universe))
  simplbda(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c1, cfne, c2), wss(cfv(ctg, c1), cfv(ctg, c2)), wceq(cuni(c1), cuni(c2)))
  isfne4b(c2, universe, c1, cuni(c1), cuni(c2))
  eqid(cuni(c1))
  syl(wa(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wbr(c1, cfne, c2)), wb(wbr(c0, cfne, c2), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)))), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantl(wbr(c0, cfne, c1), wbr(c1, cfne, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  brrelex2i(c1, cfne, c2)

  eqid(cuni(c2))
}

blocks.name: fneval
blocks.content: Two covers are finer than each other iff they are both bases for the same topology. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)

thm fneval(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  bitr4d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wbr(c0, cfne, c2), wbr(c2, cfne, c0)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2))))
  syl6bbr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wbr(c0, cfne, c2), wbr(c2, cfne, c0)), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2))), wa(wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2))), wa(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0)))))

  isfne4b(c2, c3, c0, cuni(c0), cuni(c2))

  isfne4b(c0, c1, c2, cuni(c2), cuni(c0))

  eqid(cuni(c0))
  anbi1i(wceq(cuni(c2), cuni(c0)), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0)), wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)))

  anbi2i(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wa(wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0))))
  eqss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2))
  anandi(wceq(cuni(c0), cuni(c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c2)), wss(cfv(ctg, c2), cfv(ctg, c0)))

blocks.content: Fineness intersected with its converse is an equivalence relation. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 6-Oct-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fneer(class c0) {
  |- wer(c0, universe)
  -| wceq(c0, cin(cfne, ccnv(cfne)))
} = {
  eqer(hs0, hs1, c0, cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, cv(hs1)))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cv(hs1), ctg)
  eqtri(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, cv(hs1)))), copab(hs0, hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))))
  mpbi(wceq(c0, copab(hs0, hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)))), wrel(c0))
  mp2(wrel(c0), wss(c0, cfne), wrel(cfne))
  eqsstri(c0, cfne, cin(cfne, ccnv(cfne)))
  inss1(cfne, ccnv(cfne))
  fnerel()
  relss(c0, cfne)
  dfrel4v(hs0, hs1, c0)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, cv(hs1))))
  el2v(hs0, hs1, wb(wbr(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)), cfv(ctg, cv(hs1)))))
  fneval(cv(hs0), universe, cv(hs1), universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(ctg, cv(hs1)))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(ctg, cv(hs0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fneer(class c0) {
  ⊢ c0[Er]𝕌
  ⊣ c0 =(Fne ⋂ `' Fne)
} = {
  eqer(hs0, hs1, c0, (topGen ` hs0), (topGen ` hs1))
  fveq2(hs0, hs1, ctg)
  eqtri(c0, { < hs0, hs1 > |(topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` hs1)}, { < hs0, hs1 > | hs0[c0]hs1 })
  mpbi(c0 = { < hs0, hs1 > | hs0[c0]hs1 }, Rel(c0))
  mp2(Rel(c0), c0 ⊆ Fne, Rel(Fne))
  eqsstri(c0, cfne, (Fne ⋂ `' Fne))
  inss1(cfne, `' Fne)
  fnerel()
  relss(c0, cfne)
  dfrel4v(hs0, hs1, c0)
  opabbii(hs0, hs1, hs0[c0]hs1, (topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` hs1))
  el2v(hs0, hs1, (hs0[c0]hs1 ↔(topGen ` hs0)=(topGen ` hs1)))
  fneval(hs0, universe, hs1, universe, c0)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c((topGen ` hs1))
  diff.hs1.c((topGen ` hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: topfne
blocks.content: Fineness for covers corresponds precisely with fineness for topologies. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 29-Sep-2009.)

blocks.name: topfneec
blocks.content: A cover is equivalent to a topology iff it is a base for that topology. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 8-Oct-2009.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm topfneec(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, ctop), wb(wcel(c1, cec(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)))
  -| wceq(c2, cin(cfne, ccnv(cfne)))
} = {
  syl5bb(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, cec(c0, c2)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wbr(c0, c2, c1))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c1, cec(c0, c2)), wbr(c0, c2, c1)), wrel(c2))
  relelec(c2, c1, c0)
  pm5.21ndd(wcel(c0, ctop), wbr(c0, c2, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  a1i(wcel(c0, ctop), wi(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wcel(c1, universe)))
  brrelex2i(c0, c2, c1)
  ax-mp(wrel(c2), wer(c2, universe))
  fneer(c2)
  errel(c2, universe)
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wcel(c1, universe))
  syl(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c1, ctb))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)), wcel(c1, ctb), wcel(cfv(ctg, c1), ctop))
  biimparc(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wcel(cfv(ctg, c1), ctop))
  eleq1(cfv(ctg, c1), c0, ctop)
  tgclb(c1)
  elex(c1, ctb)
  ex(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wbr(c0, c2, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, universe)), wbr(c0, c2, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)))
  fneval(c0, ctop, c1, universe, c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, universe), wb(wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0)))
  syl6bb(wcel(c0, ctop), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)), wceq(cfv(ctg, c1), c0), wceq(c0, cfv(ctg, c1)))
  eqeq1d(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1), c0, wcel(c0, ctop))
  tgtop(c0)
  eqcom(c0, cfv(ctg, c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm topfneec(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ Top →(c1 ∈[c0]c2 ↔(topGen ` c1)= c0))
  ⊣ c2 =(Fne ⋂ `' Fne)
} = {
  syl5bb(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈[c0]c2, (topGen ` c1)= c0, c0[c2]c1)
  ax-mp((c1 ∈[c0]c2 ↔ c0[c2]c1), Rel(c2))
  relelec(c2, c1, c0)
  pm5.21ndd(c0 ∈ Top, c0[c2]c1, (topGen ` c1)= c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i(c0 ∈ Top, (c0[c2]c1 → c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  brrelex2i(c0, c2, c1)
  ax-mp(Rel(c2), c2[Er]𝕌)
  fneer(c2)
  errel(c2, universe)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl((c0 ∈ Top ∧(topGen ` c1)= c0), c1 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ TopBases)
  sylibr((c0 ∈ Top ∧(topGen ` c1)= c0), c1 ∈ TopBases, (topGen ` c1)∈ Top)
  biimparc(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c1)= c0, (topGen ` c1)∈ Top)
  eleq1((topGen ` c1), c0, ctop)
  tgclb(c1)
  elex(c1, ctb)
  ex(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c2]c1 ↔(topGen ` c1)= c0))
  bitrd((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), c0[c2]c1, (topGen ` c1)= c0, (topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c1))
  fneval(c0, ctop, c1, universe, c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ 𝕌, ((topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c1)↔(topGen ` c1)= c0))
  syl6bb(c0 ∈ Top, (topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c1), (topGen ` c1)= c0, c0 =(topGen ` c1))
  eqeq1d((topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c1), c0, c0 ∈ Top)
  tgtop(c0)
  eqcom(c0, (topGen ` c1))
}

blocks.name: topfneec2
blocks.content: A topology is precisely identified with its equivalence class. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 12-Oct-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm topfneec2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wb(wceq(cec(c0, c2), cec(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cin(cfne, ccnv(cfne)))
} = {
  3bitr3d(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wceq(cec(c0, c2), cec(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c1), wbr(c0, c2, c1), wceq(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1)))
  fneval(c0, ctop, c1, ctop, c2)
  erth(c0, c2, c1, universe, wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop)), wer(c2, universe))
  fneer(c2)
  adantr(wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, ctop)
  eqeqan12d(cfv(ctg, c0), cfv(ctg, c1), c0, c1, wcel(c0, ctop), wcel(c1, ctop))
  tgtop(c0)
  tgtop(c1)
}

thm topfneec2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top)→([c0]c2 =[c1]c2 ↔ c0 = c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Fne ⋂ `' Fne)
} = {
  3bitr3d((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top), [c0]c2 =[c1]c2, c0 = c1, c0[c2]c1, (topGen ` c0)=(topGen ` c1))
  fneval(c0, ctop, c1, ctop, c2)
  erth(c0, c2, c1, universe, (c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top))
  a1i((c0 ∈ Top ∧ c1 ∈ Top), c2[Er]𝕌)
  fneer(c2)
  adantr(c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, ctop)
  eqeqan12d((topGen ` c0), (topGen ` c1), c0, c1, c0 ∈ Top, c1 ∈ Top)
  tgtop(c0)
  tgtop(c1)
}

blocks.name: refssfne
blocks.content: A cover is a refinement iff it is a subcover of something which is both finer and a refinement. (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 18-Jan-2010.) (Revised by Thierry Arnoux, 3-Feb-2020.)
